mapper.insert: insert into table_data (create_time, table_no, battle_no, fit_no, card, result, xgl, zgl, xtsl, ztsl, xjz, zjz, ljxjz, ljzjz, is_delete) values (#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tableNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{battleNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fitNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xgl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zgl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xtsl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ztsl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xjz}, #{zjz}, #{ljxjz}, #{ljzjz}, 0)

insert into table_data (create_time, table_no, battle_no, fit_no, card, result, xgl, zgl, xtsl, ztsl, xjz, zjz, ljxjz, ljzjz, is_delete) values
(#{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.tableNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.battleNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.fitNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.xgl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zgl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.xtsl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ztsl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xjz}, #{zjz}, #{ljxjz}, #{ljzjz}, 0)
mapper.update: update table_data set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, table_no = #{tableNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, battle_no = #{battleNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fit_no = #{fitNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, card = #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, xgl = #{xgl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zgl = #{zgl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xtsl = #{xtsl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ztsl = #{ztsl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xjz = #{xjz}, zjz = #{zjz}, ljxjz = #{ljxjz}, ljzjz = #{ljzjz}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, table_no, battle_no, fit_no, card, result, xgl, zgl, xtsl, ztsl, xjz, zjz, ljxjz, ljzj from table_data where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND is_delete = 0
select id, create_time, table_no, battle_no, fit_no, card, result, xgl, zgl, xtsl, ztsl, xjz, zjz, ljxjz, ljzj from table_data
select id, create_time, table_no, battle_no, fit_no, card, result, xgl, zgl, xtsl, ztsl, xjz, zjz, ljxjz, ljzj from table_data WHERE is_delete = 0 ORDER BY table_no ASC, battle_no DESC, fit_no DESC

select id, create_time, table_no, battle_no, fit_no, card, result, xgl, zgl, xtsl, ztsl, xjz, zjz, ljxjz, ljzj from table_data WHERE is_delete = 0 AND table_no = #{tableNo} ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1
